TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StateItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示视图状态信息在 Web 请求间持续时保存在 类中的项。

span.span: Represents an item that is saved in the class when view state information is persisted between Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是指页面或 ASP.NET 服务器控件的属性值的累计，并发送到隐藏字段中请求的浏览器。View state is the accumulation of a page's or an ASP.NET server control's property values and is sent to the requesting browser in a hidden field. 可以 使用 属性或方法，将对象显式添加到 ASP.NET 服务器控件的对象 。You can explicitly add objects to an ASP.NET server control's object using either the property or the method. 然后跟踪其存储的所有项的更改。The then tracks changes to all the items that it stores. 对对象所做的任何更改 都反映在其 属性中。Any changes to a object are reflected in its property. 在 服务器控制处理的 "保存" 视图状态阶段，在控件呈现到页面之前，会通过调用方法来保存这些更改。These changes are saved by a call to the method during the save view state phase of server control processing, just before the control is rendered to the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/7698y1f0(v=vs.85)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 类的和 属性 来保存简单自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件类的状态 `StateBagSample` 。The following code example uses the and properties of the class to save the state of a simple custom ASP.NET server control class, `StateBagSample`. 当页发布到服务器时， 属性将检查该项是否已被修改。When the page has posted to the server, the property checks whether the item has been modified. 状态值通过访问属性来显示 。The state values are displayed by accessing the property. [!code-csharp[StateBag_IStateManager_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StateBag_IStateManager_Sample1/CS/ism_statebag_samples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StateBag_IStateManager_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/StateBag_IStateManager_Sample1/VB/ism_statebag_samples.vb#1)]
